data.eml:eml: The immatures of lauxaniid flies (Diptera: Lauxaniidae) and their taxonomical implications

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Semelbauer, Marek, Kozánek, Milan (2014): The immatures of lauxaniid flies (Diptera: Lauxaniidae) and their taxonomical implications. Zootaxa 3780 (3): 401-454, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3780.3.1
